com.drgarbage.asm.render.intf

Interface IClassFileDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Appendable

    public interface IClassFileDocument
extends java.lang.Appendable
    A visualized class file.
    Version:
    $Revision: 187 $ $Id: IClassFileDocument.java 187 2013-06-03 05:47:37Z salekseev $
    Author:
    Peter Palaga

      • getMethodSections

        java.util.List<IMethodSection> getMethodSections()
        Returns a List of IMethodSections representing the methods of this IClassFileDocument, excluding abstract methods.
        Returns:
        List of IMethodSections representing the methods of this IClassFileDocument, excluding abstract methods; or null if this IClassFileDocument has no non-abstract methods.

      • incrementIndent

        void incrementIndent()
        Increments the current indentation by 1.

      • isLineInField

        boolean isLineInField(int line)
        Tells if the given line number includes a field declaration. The implementations should return quickly, e.g. should use some sort of index or similar.
        Parameters:
        line - 0-based line number
        Returns:
        true if the given line number includes a field declaration, false otherwise.

      • isLineInMethod

        boolean isLineInMethod(int line)
        Tells if the given line number is enclosed in some method. The implementations should return quickly, e.g. should use some sort of index or similar.
        Parameters:
        line - 0-based line number
        Returns:
        true if the given line number is enclosed in some method, false otherwise.

      • setIndentationString

        void setIndentationString(java.lang.String indentationString)
        Sets a string used for indentation in this document, e.g. "\t", or " ". This method should be used before nay rendering is done; the results will not look consistent otherwise.
        Parameters:
        indentationString -

      • getConstantPool

        AbstractConstantPoolEntry[] getConstantPool()
        Returns the constant pool object.
        Returns:
        constant pool reference
